name: SmartHQ
0:
”Alexa, smoke my salmon at two hundred degrees in smoker”
”Alexa, set smoker temperature to two hundred degrees”
”Alexa, set mixer direction to forward”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart h. q.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pair your Amazon Alexa with select GE, GE Profile, Haier, Café, or Monogram smart appliances, powered by SmartHQ. This skill, enables you to take appliance control to the next level with awesome with hands-free voice commands.

For washers, dryers and dishwashers, the SmartHQ skill now lets Alexa make announcements to alert you when your cycles are complete, and for ovens you can also have Alexa announce when the preheating and cooking is complete. To configure this, tap on the device in the Devices section of the Alexa app to access its settings page. Simply toggle announcements on and off and select which Echo devices the announcements will play through.


To get started:
- Ensure your SmartHQ compatible appliance is connected. For more information, go to geappliances.com/alexa-voice-control
- Click the "ENABLE" button in the Alexa app
- Enter your GE Appliances SmartHQ username and password to link your account
- For more information about what you can using SmartHQ please visit geappliances.com/connect

Air Conditioner
Alexa, set the air conditioner to 72 degrees
Alexa, what temperature is it in here
Alexa, turn down the air conditioner
Alexa, set the air conditioner to cool
Alexa, set the air conditioner fan speed to high

Coffee Brewer
Alexa, turn on/off coffee brewer

Oven
Alexa, turn on/off the oven
Alexa, preheat the oven to three hundred fifty degrees
Alexa, preheat the oven to three hundred fifty degrees in convection roasting
Alexa, bake for 45 minutes in the oven
Alexa, set the oven to convection baking for 20 minutes
Alexa, cook chicken nuggets in the oven for 30 minutes
Alexa, is the oven on
Alexa, what’s the temperature in the oven
Alexa, what temp did I set the oven to
Alexa, open the [upper/lower] oven door***

Microwave
Alexa, microwave for two minutes on high
Alexa, defrost five pounds of chicken
Alexa, add 30 seconds to the microwave
Alexa, pause the microwave
Alexa, resume the microwave
Alexa, stop the microwave
Alexa, microwave for 2 minutes 30 seconds

Hood
Alexa, turn on the hood fan
Alexa, turn on the hood light
Alexa, set the hood fan speed to boost
Alexa, set the hood light level to max

Advantium
Alexa, turn on/off the Advantium
Alexa, preheat the Advantium to 350 degrees
Alexa, set the Advantium to warm/broil/toast/proof
Alexa, cook for 20 minutes in the Advantium
Alexa, set Advantium to convection bake at 350 degrees
Alexa, microwave for 10 minutes in Advantium

Dishwasher
Alexa, what is the dishwasher status
Alexa, set the dishwasher status to running**
Alexa, set the dishwasher status to off**

Washer
Alexa, what is the washer status
Alexa, turn on the washer**
Alexa, turn off the washer**
Alexa, tell SmartHQ to clean [stain] stains***
Alexa, tell SmartHQ to wash [fabric]***

Dryer
Alexa,what is the dryer status
Alexa, turn on the dryer**
Alexa, turn off the dryer**
Alexa, tell SmartHQ to dry [fabric]*** 

Refrigerator with Hot Water Dispenser
Alexa, set the refrigerator to 150 degrees
Alexa, set the refrigerator to minimum/maximum
Alexa, set the refrigerator to [hot chocolate, tea, soup]

Opal Nugget Ice Maker
Alexa, turn on/off the Opal
Alexa, turn on/off the Opal light

Toaster Oven
Alexa, turn on/off the toaster oven light
Alexa, set the toaster oven to roast at 350 degrees
Alexa, set the toaster to warm at 170 degrees
Alexa, set the toaster over to reheat for 10 minutes
Alexa, set the toaster oven to air fry at 350 for 25 minutes

Dehumidifier
Alexa, turn on/off the dehumidifier
Alexa, set dehumidifier fan speed to high
Alexa, set dehumidifier humidity level to 50%

Stand Mixer
Alexa, set stand mixer to [0-11]
Alexa, set stand mixer direction to [forward/reverse]
Alexa, turn off stand mixer

Feature Notes

**Remote start cycles available on select models
***On select models equipped with voice to open door capability
***On select models equipped with laundry assistant

Questions?
Visit geappliances.com/connecthelp or call GE Appliances' Connected Home Support Line at 1-800-220-6899.
